name: We Build Cities
description:
We build cities will create a twist from the conventional builder games, it will put you in the place of a person who has to get and deliver the resources for buildings.

Each building needs different resources and you can carry one a fixed number so it makes you think twice about which resources you will build. If you picked up the wrong one you have either throw them in the trash or trade them or sell them for upgrades.

Currently version 0.1.2

Every feedback is welcomed.

Multiplayer coming soon.
